Greeting.1: I am gonna tear you limb from limb
Greeting.2: I don't have anything to say to you

Introduction.1: I am known as a strong soldier in these parts

Refute_Question.1: I do not see any reason why I should tell you that

Ask_Name.1: Guess I will ask your name before I do away with you

Ask_Origin.1: What hole did you crawl out of

Friend_Reason.1: I am here to keep out scoundrels like you

Response_Origin.1: I am from a better place than you

Good_Intentions.2: You should introduce yourself to the people of the village

Familiar_Greet.2: I hope life is treating you well
Familiar_Greet.3: It seems we cross paths yet again

Question_Denied.1: I see you don't want to cooperate
Question_Denied.2: I feel like it would be in both our interests if you would tell me
Question_Denied.3: I must ask you to reconsider answering me

request_spar.1: I see you don't want to cooperate
request_spar.2: I feel like it would be in both our interests if you would tell me
request_spar.3: I must ask you to reconsider answering me

response_spar.1: I see you don't want to cooperate

action_bribe.1: I can get you something good if you leave now.

action_grovel.1: Please take my valuables, just don't kill me!

question_alliance.1: Never ally with the other villages.

response_experience.1: I ranked in the top of my soldier squad.
